description: Successive decimal digits of triangular numbers.
references: Jason Rogers and Jason Earls, 0.1361015212836455566789110512013615..., A Split Novel, Lulu Press, NY, 2006, p. 84.
mathematica: Flatten[ IntegerDigits /@ Accumulate@ Range[0, 38]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 15 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
